sentences.en: a soldier who, on the surface, appeared brave and patriotic.
sentences.cn: 表面上很勇敢和爱国的一个士兵

sentences.en: As the egg whites cook, they coagulate and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 蛋白一煮就会凝结，并且浮起来。

sentences.en: Back in Britain, things appear, on the surface, simpler.
sentences.cn: 而在英国国内，事情表面上看来要简单一些。

sentences.en: Constant wheelchair use will scuff almost any floor surface.
sentences.cn: 任何地板上经常有轮椅走动几乎都会有所磨损。

sentences.en: Gas bubbles in any liquid tend to rise to the surface .
sentences.cn: 在任何液体中气泡往往都会浮到表面。

sentences.en: Goods may be sent by surface mail or airmail.
sentences.cn: 货物可通过平寄或空运发送。

sentences.en: He staggered on the uneven surface of the car park.
sentences.cn: 他摇摇晃晃地行走在停车场凹凸不平的地面上。

sentences.en: Last year Toole surfaced again in Cuba.
sentences.cn: 去年图尔再次在古巴露面。

sentences.en: Lightly score the surface of the steaks with a knife.
sentences.cn: 在牛排表面轻轻打花刀。

sentences.en: More familiar landscapes have been sculpted by surface erosion.
sentences.cn: 还有更多熟悉的地貌是因地表侵蚀形成的。

sentences.en: Nearly 10% of the Earth’s surface is covered by ice.
sentences.cn: 地球表面将近 10% 被冰层覆盖。

sentences.en: Rub the surface of the wood in preparation for the varnish.
sentences.cn: 打磨木头的表面，为刷清漆做准备。

sentences.en: Rumours of financial scandals have come bubbling back to the surface.
sentences.cn: 有关财务丑闻的谣言接连不断地冒出来。

sentences.en: She watches him plane the surface of a walnut board.
sentences.cn: 她看着他刨平一块胡桃木板。

sentences.en: Somewhere deep beneath the surface lay a caring character.
sentences.cn: 在内心深处的某个角落里埋藏着一颗爱心。

sentences.en: The star's surface temperature is reckoned to be minus 75 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 这颗恒星的表面温度估计在零下75摄氏度左右。

sentences.en: The surface-to-surface missiles were fired from the west of the capital.
sentences.cn: 从首都西部发射了多枚地对地导弹。

sentences.en: Then the wind dropped and the surface of the sea was still.
sentences.cn: 后来风势渐弱，海面重归平静。

sentences.en: Turn out the dough on to a floured surface.
sentences.cn: 把生面团倒在撒了面粉的案板上。

words.tran_cn: 表面堆焊；铺以面；铺面材料

phrases.tran_cn: 为所有意图和目的；在外表上
光滑表面；光滑面；平滑面
比表面；比表面积；表面系数
表面质量；表面符号；外观要求
表面粗糙度；表面光洁度
表面温度；地表温度；表层水温

trans.tran_en: relating to the part of the army, navy etc that travels by land or on the sea, rather than by air or under the sea

trans.tran_cn: 表面，表层，台面，操作台，外表
trans.tran_en: the top layer of an area of water or land
if someone or something surfaces, they suddenly appear somewhere, especially after being gone or hidden for a long time
